üöÄ MBA From IIM Lucknow üöÄ |üéØ Master of Stakeholder Management üéØ | üí° Forte at Implementation & Process Optimization üí° | üå± Open to Growth & Product Roles üå± | Let's collaborate and transform ideas into reality! üîó

IT Consultant in BFSI Presales at Hexaware, managing multi-million dollar RFI/RFP deals and driving digital transformation for clients. Previously a Software Engineer at Cognizant, I have also been a founding member in multiple startups, including my own, leading 0-to-1 execution and business growth. An MBA from IIM Lucknow and a B.Tech graduate from Tezpur University, I specialize in presales, solutioning, stakeholder management, and digital strategy. Always open to collaborations that drive innovation and impact.
